about.title: About HD Store
about.subtitle: Your trusted source for premium imported laptops in Assiut since 2008
about.storyText: HD Store has been serving the Assiut community since 2008, providing high-quality imported and refurbished laptops from top global brands. We carefully inspect and test every device to ensure it meets our quality standards before it reaches your hands.
about.missionText: To make premium laptop technology accessible and affordable for everyone in Assiut, with reliable after-sales support and transparent pricing.
about.qualityDesc: Every laptop is tested and graded honestly
about.transparencyDesc: Clear specs, honest grading, no hidden issues
about.supportDesc: We're always available on WhatsApp for any questions

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We're here to help! Reach out through any of these channels.
contact.ctaTitle: Have a question? We're just a message away!
contact.ctaDesc: Our team is available on WhatsApp to help you with anything â€” product info, orders, or support.
contact.address: Al-Gomhoria St, Othman Towers - In front of Bank of Cairo, Asyut, Egypt
contact.addressValue: Al-Gomhoria St, Othman Towers - In front of Bank of Cairo, Asyut, Egypt

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about HD Store
faq.moreQuestionsDesc: We're happy to help. Reach out to us on WhatsApp!
faq.a1: Currently, we only deliver within Assiut city and all Assiut centers. We do not ship to other governorates at this time.
faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.a2: We accept Cash on Delivery (COD) only. You pay when you receive your laptop at your doorstep.
faq.a3: Our laptops are imported/used or imported/refurbished from international markets. Each device is thoroughly inspected, tested, and graded (A, B, or C) based on its condition.
faq.a4: All products come with a functional warranty (typically 14-30 days depending on the product). The warranty covers manufacturing and functional defects. Cosmetic wear typical for used devices is not covered.
faq.a5: Most laptops include a charger. The product listing will clearly state if a charger is included or not. Keyboard layout (Arabic, English, or Arabic-English) is also specified.
faq.q6: Can I return or exchange a laptop?
faq.a6: Yes! You have 7 days from receiving the product to request a return or exchange. The device must be in the same condition as delivered, with no physical or liquid damage, and all included accessories must be returned.
faq.q7: How do I confirm my order?
faq.a7: After submitting the checkout form on our website, you'll be redirected to WhatsApp to confirm your order with our team. The order is only confirmed after WhatsApp confirmation.
faq.a8: Delivery within Assiut city typically takes 1-2 business days. Delivery to other Assiut centers may take 2-3 business days.

warranty.title: Warranty & Returns Policy
warranty.subtitle: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase
warranty.warrantyText1: All devices sold by HD Store are imported/used or imported/refurbished laptops. Each device is carefully inspected and tested before sale.
warranty.warrantyText2: We provide a functional warranty for a limited period (14-30 days depending on the product) covering manufacturing and functional defects discovered during normal use.
warranty.warrantyText3: Cosmetic wear, minor scratches, or signs of normal use typical for imported/used devices are NOT considered defects and are not covered under warranty.
warranty.returnsText1: You have 7 days from the date of receiving your product to request a return or exchange.
warranty.returnsCond1: Device must be in the same condition as delivered
warranty.returnsCond5: Charger and all included accessories must be returned (if originally included)
warranty.returnsProcessText: Contact us on WhatsApp to initiate a return. After inspection and approval, we will process your refund or exchange. Delivery fees may be non-refundable.
warranty.noteText: All returns are subject to inspection by our technical team. We reserve the right to decline a return if the device shows signs of misuse, physical damage, or unauthorized modifications.
warranty.claimTitle: Need to file a warranty claim?
warranty.claimDesc: Contact us on WhatsApp and we'll guide you through the process.

policies.title: Store Policies
policies.subtitle: Please read our policies carefully
policies.privacyText: We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. We collect only the information necessary to process your order (name, phone number, and delivery address). We do not share your information with third parties. Your data is used solely for order processing and communication.
policies.termsText: By placing an order through HD Store, you agree to our terms. All products are sold as-is with the described condition and grade. Prices are in Egyptian Pounds (EGP) and are subject to change. Orders are confirmed only after WhatsApp confirmation. We reserve the right to cancel orders that cannot be fulfilled.
policies.shippingText: We deliver exclusively within Assiut governorate (Assiut city and all centers). Delivery typically takes 1-3 business days. Shipping fees are calculated based on your location within Assiut. Cash on Delivery (COD) is our only payment method.
policies.legalText: HD Store is a registered business operating in Assiut, Egypt. All product images are for illustration purposes. Actual product appearance may vary slightly. We make every effort to accurately describe our products but minor discrepancies may occur.
policies.questionsDesc: Contact us on WhatsApp for any clarifications.
